sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Russia says it has squashed what it claims was a cross-border attack from Ukraine, but Kyiv has denied involvement.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Some farmers in Italy fear they could lose their livelihoods after heavy flooding devastated harvests.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Dozens of US and European lawmakers call for oil executive Sultan al-Jabbar to be removed as president of this year's COP28 climate conference.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: German police have launched a series of raids on the homes of climate activists suspected of raising money to fund illegal activities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Russia claims to have squashed what it describes as one of the most serious cross-border attacks from Ukraine in its Belgorod region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Moscow's Ministry of Defense released footage claiming to show the destruction of so-called Ukrainian saboteurs, and they reportedly killed dozens during a battle that lasted around 24 hours. But Kyiv has pushed back against the claim, saying that the attack was an uprising against the Kremlin by Russian dissidents and continues to deny any involvement.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And images of what's said to be an armed anti-Kremlin Russian group are also in circulation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Local authorities have evacuated villages bordering Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Residents are being put up in temporary accommodation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The regional governor said 100 people have been bussed out of the region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Ukraine has reported more Russian shelling in the region of Kherson, interrupting power supplies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Russian forces fired 17 times at the region and several injuries were reported.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: All EU governments are recommended to end their support measures for energy prices by the end of this year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This is what the European Commission proposes in order to stay in line with fiscal rules.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Following Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine, EU governments have spent heavily in order to mitigate the effects of rising energy costs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Now the Commission says that support measures, if needed, should be targeted at protecting vulnerable households and firms.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The main measure is winding down the energy universal supportive measures.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: This is, I think, where you can have more room of maneuver. Of course, we are not entering too much on taxation policies of different member states.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Fiscal rules were suspended during the COVID pandemic, but that suspension is due to expire in 2024.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The review of the rules is still under discussion, but there is still an open debate on how to safeguard investments while reducing debt and deficit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Commissioner Gentiloni says the signals are positive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Despite the fact that we have, of course, declining level of debt, declining level of deficit to GDP, and we need to have more cautious fiscal policies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We are not entering in the loop that we had in previous crisis of gradually reducing the level of public investments the EU Commission is already warning that the deficit criterion is not fulfilled by 14 countries including France Germany and Italy while the debt criterion is not fulfilled by three Italy France and Finland an excessive deficit procedure may open next year which could lead to sanctions against those not complying with the rules police in Germany have raided 15 properties across the country as part of

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: an investigation into the financing of environmental protests Munich prosecutors say they suspect seven activists from the last generation climate action group of raising more than one million euros to finance illegal actions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: No one has yet been arrested.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In recent weeks, last generation has blocked traffic on Berlin's busy intersections and highways on an almost daily basis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On Twitter, the group called the investigation completely insane.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Activists from the group have also staged protests targeting artworks and exhibits.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Two of the suspects are also under investigation for planning to sabotage an oil pipeline in Bavaria.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The group argues that its protests, which it acknowledges are provocative, are meant to encourage debate with anxiety about climate change.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Claudio has been a farmer for over 40 years. He used to manage 600 hectares of land that would generate around 2 million euros per year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: As a result of the floods, he almost lost everything.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We met him in his office as he assessed the damage. Siamo arrivati a un rischio di circa 2 milioni di euro per anno. Come risultato della flotta, ha quasi perso tutto. Ci siamo incontrati nel suo office per assaggiare il danno.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In più di dover pagare per ciò che ha perso, dovrà investire fondi extra per rinnovare il negozio. Sono circa 800 mila euro di mancate entrate, di mancato raccolto di quest'anno.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: E poi bisogna calcolare tutti i vari danni che avremo nei prossimi anni per riuscire a arrivare nuovamente a raccogliere.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A proposito del pacchetto di aiuto del governo, è preoccupato che non abbia abbastanza money in futuro per pagare le detti esistenti.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Come faccio? Pagare gli operai, pagare i fornitori, pagare il tempo possibile.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Quindi da qualche parte dovranno arrivare se vogliamo provare a stare in piedi, ma al momento non ho idea come e dove.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Ha portato noi su una tour per dimostrare come malissimo l'area è stata affettata da un'aeroporto pesante.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: La maggior parte dei suoi plani sono sotto l'acqua, ma poco che può essere fatto per salvare le crop.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Più o meno ci sono due metri e mezzo di acqua sopra, avevamo 20 ettari di pomodoro, 10 di mais, insomma altre culture, è tutto perso.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Il danno ai vineyard è stato il più significativo.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Qui ci vogliono tre anni per arrivare alla produzione, quindi abbiamo il costo annualmente uguale per fare i trattamenti e tutto, senza raccogliere niente per tre anni.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Molti altri agricoltori sono stati caldificati come Claudio. Tutto senza raccogliere niente per tre anni. Euronews in Ravenna.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: More than 130 US and European lawmakers are calling for oil executive Sultan al-Jubeir to be removed as president of this year's COP28 climate conference.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: In a joint letter addressed to the UN, EU Commission President Ursula von der Leyen and US President Joe Biden, the lawmakers warn of fossil fuel companies exerting undue influence over the talks due to take place in the United Arab Emirates.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The decision, they say, to name as president of COP28 the chief executive of one of the world's largest oil and gas companies, a company that has recently announced plans to add 7.6 billion barrels of oil to its production in the coming years representing the fifth largest increase in the world risks undermining the negotiations. Al-Jubeir runs the state- owned Abu Dhabi National Oil Company. It's accepted that the host nation for the COP talks names the conference president. Al-Jubeir is a trusted confidant of the UAE's ruling family.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: EU and U.S. leaders have so far backed Al-Jubeir's appointment, and the COP spokesperson has defended him, noting his 20-year career and experience as an engineer working across the energy spectrum.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis is reportedly set to announce he's running for the White House in a conversation with Elon Musk on Twitter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The 44-year-old has long been seen as former U.S. President Donald Trump's leading Republican rival.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: DeSantis has emerged as a national star in Republican politics, leading on controversial cultural issues such as signing and expanding his state's so-called Don't Say Gay law that bans classroom discussions of LGBTQ plus issues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: His bid increases a crowded field of Republican hopefuls.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Trump is currently in the lead, followed by his former vice president, Mike Pence, and one time South Carolina Governor Nikki Haley.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Residents of Guam are hunkering down as the island was pelted with rain and winds from Typhoon Mahwah, the strongest storm to approach the U.S. Pacific Territory in decades.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Anyone not living in a concrete house was urged to seek safety elsewhere before it makes landfall.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's forecast to arrive as a Category 4 storm with winds of around 225 kilometers per hour, but could strengthen to a Category 5.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The island is home to around 150,000 people, many of whom have already lost power.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Some to the south have also lost access to water.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A disgruntled teen, after having her phone confiscated,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: sparked a deadly blaze that resulted in the tragic death of 18 girls and one boy in a girls' school dormitory in the mining city of Madia in Guyana last Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The fire has shocked the South American country, which decreed three days of mourning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: According to the official investigation, the girls sprayed insecticide on a curtain and ignited it with a matchstick, causing the fire to rapidly consume the wooden structure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Seventeen young women were were hospitalized, among them the girl who allegedly ignited the fire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: In 2022, more than 100 million people across the globe were classified as refugees. They

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: have been forced from their homes mainly due to conflict, violence, human rights violations or persecution.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: According to the UN's chief, the terrible truth is that the world is failing to live up to its commitments to protect civilians, commitments enshrined in international humanitarian law.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: At the UN, the Security Council is debating a report on the protection of civilians in combat zones and is urging members to influence warring parties to respect the rules of war last November states adopted the political declaration to protect civilians by restricting or refraining from the use of explosive weapons in populated areas I urge all states to join and turn the declaration into meaningful action.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And in December, the Security Council adopted Resolution 2664, which aims to prevent United Nations sanctions from arming civilians and obstructing humanitarian action. I urge all states to implement it and to exclude humanitarian and medical activities from their own counterterrorism and sanctions measures.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Several measures are being debated, from the obligation to provide all civilians access to humanitarian workers, a resolution against the use of starvation as a weapon of war, and to outlaw attacks on emergency workers.
